en.emailConfirmation: Email confirmation has been sent to
en.getDecreeNisi: Your {{ session.divorceWho }} gets a decree nisi
en.notDefendedText1: Your response will be checked and then sent to your {{ session.divorceWho }}. They can then apply for the court order which will divorce you.
en.notDefendedText2: The order (known as a decree) is made in 2 stages. You’re only divorced once both stages are complete.
en.notDefendedListItem1: The 'decree nisi', which shows that the court agrees that you’re entitled to a divorce.
en.notDefendedListItem2: The 'decree absolute', which legally ends the marriage. It cannot be made until at least 6 weeks after the decree nisi.
en.notDefendedText3: You’ll be sent an email after each stage.
en.notDefendedText4: The court can cancel (legally known as rescind) the decree nisi at any time up until the decree absolute, if it’s presented with new evidence showing why you shouldn’t be given a divorce.
en.notDefendedText5: Contact the divorce centre if you don’t hear anything back after 6 weeks.
en.notDefendedAdultery1: The court needs to be sure that adultery took place for it to be used as the reason for divorce (legally known as the 'fact').
en.notDefendedAdultery2: To continue with the divorce your {{ session.divorceWho }} will need to either:
en.notDefendedAdulteryLi1: change their reason for divorce (and pay a fee of £{{ feesAmendDivorce }})
en.notDefendedAdultery3: You’ll be contacted by the court when your {{ session.divorceWho }} has made their decision.
en.notDefended2YearsNoConsent: As you haven’t given your consent, the divorce won’t be able to continue based on the 2 years separation with consent 'fact' (reason for divorce).
en.notDefended2YearsNoConsent1: The application will be returned to your {{ session.divorceWho }}. If they choose to continue, they will need to change the reason for divorce to one that doesn’t need your consent.
en.notDefended2YearsNoConsent2: Your {{ session.divorceWho }} will have to pay £{{ feesAmendDivorce }} to change the reason. You may have to pay some or all of this extra fee if they’ve applied to claim their divorce costs.
en.notDefended2YearsNoConsent3: You’ll be contacted by the court when your {{ session.divorceWho }} has made their decision.
en.notDefended2YearsNoConsentH2: If you decide that you want to consent to the divorce
en.notDefended2YearsNoConsent4: You can change your mind and give your consent to the divorce at any time. You’ll need to do this in writing. Contact the divorce centre if you want to do this.
en.defendedText1: You have 21 days to submit the 'answer to a divorce application' form from the date that you first signed into your divorce account.
en.defendedText2: Download and fill in the paper form.
en.defendedText4: You’ll have to pay a £{{ feesDefendDivorce }} fee when you submit the form. If you have little or no savings, are on certain benefits or have a low income you may be able to
en.defendedText4Link: get help with paying this fee
en.defendedText5: You’ll probably have to go to a hearing with your {{ session.divorceWho }} to try to come to an agreement over the divorce.
en.defendedText6: If you don’t submit your answer before the deadline, then your {{ session.divorceWho }} can continue the divorce as if you hadn’t said that you intended to defend the divorce.
en.ifYouNeedHelpText: You can contact the divorce centre if you need help. Court staff can’t give you legal advice however, and you should speak to a solicitor or legal adviser.
en.helpImproveText: Please help us improve this service by leaving your feedback.
en.nominatedSol: You have nominated a solicitor to respond to your {{ session.divorceWho }}’s divorce application on your behalf.
en.solNextDetails: Your solicitor will receive instructions on how  to respond on your behalf. They must respond  to the application within 7 days. If they don’t, your {{ session.divorceWho }} can ask the court to move the divorce forward without you. You may have to pay extra fees if this happens.
en.divorceCenterHours: Monday to Friday, 8am to 8pm, Saturday 8am to 2pm

en.financialSituationHeading: What you need to do now
en.financialSituationText1: You need to fill in another form and send it to the court if you want it to consider your financial situation after the divorce.
en.financialSituationFormLink: Form B: Notice of application to consider the financial position of the respondent after divorce.

cy.emailConfirmation: Mae neges e-bost yn cadarnhau ein bod wedi cael eich cais wedi’i anfon i
cy.husbandWifeApplied: Mae eich {{ session.divorceWho }} yn gwneud cais
cy.getDecreeNisi: Bydd eich {{ session.divorceWho }} yn cael dyfarniad nisi
cy.madeFinal: Mae eich cais am ysgariad wedi’i gwblhau
cy.notDefendedText1: Byddir yn gwirio eich ymateb ac yna yn ei anfon at eich {{ session.divorceWho }}. Yna, bydd yn gallu gwneud cais am orchymyn llys i gael ysgariad oddi wrthych.
cy.notDefendedText2: Mae 2 gam i’r gorchymyn llys (a elwir yn ‘dyfarniad’). Dim ond pan fydd y ddau gam wedi’u cwblhau y byddwch wedi ysgaru.
cy.notDefendedListItem1: Y ‘dyfarniad nisi’, yw’r ddogfen a gewch gan y llys pan fydd yn cytuno bod gennych hawl i gael ysgariad.
cy.notDefendedListItem2: Y ‘dyfarniad absoliwt’, sy’n dod â’r briodas i ben yn gyfreithlon. Ni ellir ei roi tan o leiaf 6 wythnos ar ôl y dyfarniad nisi.
cy.notDefendedText3: Anfonir e-bost atoch yn dilyn pob cam.
cy.notDefendedText4: Gall y llys ganslo (‘dadwneud’, yn iaith y gyfraith) y datganiad nisi unrhyw bryd hyd at adeg cyflwyno’r dyfarniad absoliwt, os bydd yn cael tystiolaeth newydd yn dangos na ddylech gael ysgariad.
cy.notDefendedText5: Cysylltwch â ni os na fyddwch wedi clywed gennym ar ôl 6 wythnos.
cy.notDefendedAdultery1: Mae angen i’r llys fod yn sicr y bu godineb er mwyn defnyddio hynny yn rheswm dros ysgaru (‘y ffaith’, yn iaith y gyfraith).
cy.notDefendedAdultery2: I fwrw ymlaen â’r ysgariad bydd angen i’ch {{ session.divorceWho }}:
cy.notDefendedAdulteryLi1: newid y rheswm dros ysgaru (a thalu ffi o Â£{{ feesAmendDivorce }})
cy.notDefendedAdultery3: Bydd y llys yn cysylltu â chi pan fydd eich {{ session.divorceWho }} wedi penderfynu.
cy.notDefended2YearsNoConsent: Gan nad ydych wedi rhoi cydsyniad, ni fydd yr ysgariad yn gallu mynd yn ei flaen yn seiliedig ar y ffaith (y rheswm dros ysgaru) eich bod wedi gwahanu ers dwy flynedd gyda chydsyniad.
cy.notDefended2YearsNoConsent1: Dychwelir y cais i’ch {{ session.divorceWho }}. Os bydd yn dewis parhau, bydd angen iddo/iddi newid y rheswm dros ysgaru am reswm arall lle nad oes angen eich caniatâd.
cy.notDefended2YearsNoConsent2: Bydd yn rhaid i’ch {{ session.divorceWho }} dalu Â£{{ feesAmendDivorce }} i newid y rheswm. Efallai y bydd yn rhaid ichi dalu cyfran o’r ffi ychwanegol hon, neu’r ffi yn ei chyfanrwydd, os gwnaeth gais i hawlio costau ysgaru.
cy.notDefended2YearsNoConsent3: Bydd y llys yn cysylltu â chi pan fydd eich {{ session.divorceWho }} wedi penderfynu.
cy.notDefended2YearsNoConsentH2: Os byddwch yn penderfynu eich bod am gydsynio i’r ysgariad
cy.notDefended2YearsNoConsent4: Gallwch newid eich meddwl a chydsynio i’r ysgariad unrhyw bryd. Bydd angen ichi wneud hynny’n ysgrifenedig. Cysylltwch â’r ganolfan ysgaru os ydych eisiau gwneud hynny.
cy.defendedText1: Mae gennych 21 diwrnod i gyflwyno’r 'ffurflen ymateb i gais am ysgariad' o’r dyddiad y gwnaethoch fewngofnodi gyntaf i’r cyfrif ysgaru.
cy.defendedText2: Llwytho ffurflen bapur i lawr a’i llenwi.
cy.defendedText4: Bydd rhaid i chi dalu ffi o Â£{{ feesDefendDivorce }} pan fyddwch yn cyflwyno’r ffurflen. Os nad oes gennych unrhyw arian wrth gefn, neu os nad oes gennych ond ychydig o arian wrth gefn, os ydych yn derbyn rhai budd-daliadau neu os ydych ar incwm isel, efallai y gallwch
cy.defendedText4Link: help i dalu’r ffi
cy.defendedText5: Mae’n debyg y bydd yn rhaid i chi fynd i wrandawiad gyda’ch {{ session.divorceWho }}  i geisio dod i gytundeb ynghylch yr ysgariad.
cy.defendedText6: Os na fyddwch yn cyflwyno eich ateb mewn pryd, gall eich {{ session.divorceWho }}  fwrw ymlaen â’r ysgariad fel pe baech heb ddweud eich bod yn bwriadu ei amddiffyn.
cy.ifYouNeedHelpText: Os ydych angen cymorth, gallwch gysylltu â’r ganolfan ysgaru. Fodd bynnag, ni all staff y llys roi cyngor cyfreithiol ichi, a dylech siarad â chyfreithiwr neu gynghorydd cyfreithiol.
cy.helpImproveHeading: Helpwch ni i wella’r gwasanaeth hwn
cy.helpImproveText: Helpwch ni i wella’r gwasanaeth hwn drwy gynnig sylwadau.
cy.nominatedSol: Rydych wedi penodi cyfreithiwr i ymateb ar eich rhan i gais eich {{ session.divorceWho }} am ysgariad.
cy.solNextDetails: Bydd eich cyfreithiwr yn derbyn cyfarwyddiadau yn egluro sut i ymateb ar eich rhan. Rhaid i’r cyfreithiwr ymateb i’r cais o fewn 7 diwrnod. Os na fydd yn gwneud hynny, gall eich {{ session.divorceWho }} ofyn i’r llys fwrw ymlaen â’r ysgariad heboch. Mae’n bosib y bydd rhaid ichi dalu ffioedd ychwanegol os digwydd hyn.

cy.financialSituationHeading: Beth sydd angen i chi ei wneud nesaf?
cy.financialSituationText1: Mae angen ichi lenwi ffurflen arall a’i hanfon i’r llys os ydych am i’r llys ystyried eich sefyllfa ariannol ar ôl ysgaru.
cy.financialSituationFormLink: Ffurflen B: Hysbysiad o gais i ystyried sefyllfa ariannol yr atebydd ar ôl ysgaru.
